text: Seton Hill is a Leading Catholic, Liberal Arts University
At Seton Hill University, we prepare you for the world in which you are destined to live, and for the career in which you will succeed.
Are you ready to start moving up?

Seton Hill is a nationally recognized liberal arts university, where you will receive a top education in your chosen field of study and graduate with a deeper understanding of the arts, sciences and humanities.
Specialize in creative professional writing; graphic design, web design and branding; or integrated business and marketing communication.

We succeed in our mission  - of educating students to think and act critically, creatively and ethically as productive members of society committed to transforming the world - with your support.

Since 1885, Seton Hill has been educating students to be “fit for the world in which you are destined to live.”  The first step – the most important step – is finding the college or university that is the right fit for you. Whether you are fresh out of high school, a professional looking for a new career (or to enrich a current one), or a busy adult entering college for the first time, we have programs tailored to suit your needs.
"Seton Hill is a strong, vibrant community of mentors, learners, dreamers and do-ers - a stunning mosaic of cultures, heritages, values and beliefs."

Seton Hill's online application system allows you to create your own login and password, so you can save and return to your application as many times as you need before submitting. (No pressure to get everything perfect right away.) Let's get your future started!
Complete an application you've already started.
Download a print application and mail it in:
Apply to Seton Hill through the Common Application.
Future Graduate Program & Adult Degree Program Students
UNLESS you are interested in applying to the Physician Assistant or Orthodontic Programs:
Apply online to the Physician Assistant Program through the
Centralized Application Service for Physician Assistants (CASPA)
Apply to the Orthodontics Program through the
American Dental Education Association Postdoctoral Application Support Service (ADEA PASS)

We will stay in touch throughout the application process to let you know if we need any additional information, and to answer any questions you may have. We also love to hear from you, so please feel free to call or email at any time.
For future undergraduate students, including transfers.
Office of Graduate and Adult Studies
For future graduate program and Adult Degree Program students.
We look forward to meeting you!

Graduate Students: Find Info Sessions & Visit Opportunities Here!
